title: 10 breathtaking matric ball dresses that rocked the 2019 matric dance season
text:
As matriculants all around the country prepare to write their final exams, there is no denying that looks were served during this year’s matric dance season which is almost over.

From luxury Porsches paired with designer gowns to celebrity children who dazzled in Louis Vuitton, this year’s matriculants went all out with their outfits that could easily give celebrity red carpet looks a run for their money.

And while the boys looked crisp and clean, the girls brought their A-game!

READ MORE: Meet Candy Smith, the woman who's determined to make Free State another one of South Africa's major fashion hubs

Here’s 10 of our favourite amazing matric ball dresses of 2019.

1. Maletšemana Mojapelo’s black Orapeleng Modutle number

READ MORE: From Porsches to a Gert Johan Coetzee gown – this girl’s extravagant matric dance was epic

9. Sparkles are a girl’s best friend

10. Nolwazi Zulu took the saying “black is beautiful” to a whole new level
